# Conversion Leak Checklist

5 items that usually surface where conversion breaks. Use on landing pages, lead forms, or thank-you pages.

---

## 1. Above-the-fold CTA

- [ ] Primary CTA is visible without scrolling
- [ ] CTA button color contrasts with background
- [ ] CTA text is action-oriented ("Get the guide" not "Submit")

---

## 2. Form length and fields

- [ ] Only essential fields (name, email minimum; add phone/company only if needed)
- [ ] No duplicate asks (e.g., email twice)
- [ ] Progress indicator if more than 3 fields

---

## 3. Trust signals

- [ ] Social proof or logos near form
- [ ] Privacy policy or "we won't spam" visible
- [ ] Secure/HTTPS indicated

---

## 4. Thank-you page and handoff

- [ ] Immediate confirmation message
- [ ] Clear next step (download, check email, etc.)
- [ ] Nurture sequence triggers on submit

---

## 5. Mobile and load

- [ ] Form usable on mobile (tap targets, no pinch-zoom)
- [ ] Page loads in under 3 seconds
- [ ] No layout shift when form renders

---

**Quick action:** If 2+ items are unchecked, prioritize those first. Usually fixes in 1â€“2 days.
